languages.text:
Предметы в правой части окна сбора трофеев попадают в ваш инвентарь — такие предметы могут использоваться персонажами. Предметы в левой части упаковываются в грузы корабля — в дальнейшем вы сможете использовать их для торговли с разными фракциями.
Вы можете переместить предмет из одной части окна в другую, перетащив его иконку с зажатой [ЛКМ]. Кнопки в нижней части окна позволяют перемещать сразу все предметы из одной половины в другую. Когда предметы в окне трофеев распределены, нажмите кнопку "Собрать все" или клавишу [SPACE], чтобы они переместились в грузы или инвентарь соответственно.

Trophies on the right side of the trophy window go to your inventory — such items can be used or equipped by your characters. Trophies on the left are packed up as cargo and sent to your ship, which can later be used to trade with various factions.
You can move trophies from one side of the window to the other by dragging them over using [LMB]. Alternatively, you can use the buttons at the bottom to mass transfer all trophies to the cargo or inventory section of the trophy window and vice versa. Click "Collect all" or press [SPACE] to transfer the trophies from both sides of the trophy window to the corresponding windows.
languages.original_text:
Предметы в правой части окна сбора трофеев попадают в ваш инвентарь — такие предметы могут использоваться персонажами. Предметы в левой части упаковываются в грузы корабля — в дальнейшем вы сможете использовать их для торговли с разными фракциями.
Вы можете переместить предмет из одной части окна в другую, перетащив его иконку с зажатой [ЛКМ]. Кнопки в нижней части окна позволяют перемещать сразу все предметы из одной половины в другую. Когда предметы в окне трофеев распределены, нажмите кнопку "Собрать все" или клавишу [SPACE], чтобы они переместились в грузы или инвентарь соответственно.

traits.locale_text:
Items on the right side of the trophy collection window go to your inventory — such items can be used or equipped by your characters. Items on the left are packed up as cargo and sent to your ship, which can later be used to trade with various factions.
You can move trophies from one side of the window to the other by double-clicking [LMB] on them or dragging them over using [LMB]. Alternatively, you can use the buttons at the bottom to mass transfer all items from cargo to your inventory or vice versa.

Not everything in this world is of significant value — along the way you will find many trophies that are hardly worthy of your attention.
When inspecting the bodies and containers, you can click the "All to cargos" button to pack unnecessary items into cargo and later use them to trade with different factions. Alternatively, move the found items to your inventory by clicking the "All to inventory" button.

Items on the right side of the trophy collection window go to your inventory — such items can be used or equipped by your characters. Items on the left are packed up as cargo and sent to your ship, which can later be used to trade with various factions.
You can move trophies from one side of the window to the other by double-clicking [LMB] on them or dragging them over using [LMB]. Alternatively, you can use the buttons at the bottom to mass transfer all items from cargo to your inventory or vice versa.

Trophies on the right side of the trophy window go to your inventory — such items can be used or equipped by your characters. Trophies on the left are packed up as cargo and sent to your ship, which can later be used to trade with various factions.
You can move trophies from one side of the window to the other by double-clicking [LMB] on them or by dragging them over using [LMB]. Alternatively, you can use the buttons at the bottom to mass transfer all trophies to the cargo or inventory section of the trophy window and vice versa. Hold [SPACE] to transfer the trophies from both sides of the trophy window to the corresponding sections.

Alternatively, you can use the buttons at the bottom to mass transfer all trophies to the cargo or inventory section of the trophy window and vice versa. Hold [SPACE] to transfer the trophies from both sides of the trophy window to the corresponding sections.

You can move trophies from one side of the window to the other by double-clicking [LMB] on them or by dragging them over using [LMB]. Alternatively, you can use the buttons at the bottom to mass transfer all items from cargo to your inventory and vice versa.

languages.text:
战利品窗口右侧的物品会放在您的物品栏中，这些物品可以由您的角色使用或装备。左侧的战利品则会被整理好，送到飞船的货舱中，之后可以用来与各大派系进行交易。
您可以按下鼠标左键，将战利品从窗口一侧拖拽至另一侧。除此之外，您还可以通过底部的按钮，将所有战利品移动至物品栏或货舱中，或是反向移动。点击“全部拿取”或按下空格键，可以将两侧的战利品移动至相应窗口。
languages.original_text:
Trophies on the right side of the trophy window go to your inventory — such items can be used or equipped by your characters. Trophies on the left are packed up as cargo and sent to your ship, which can later be used to trade with various factions.
You can move trophies from one side of the window to the other by dragging them over using [LMB]. Alternatively, you can use the buttons at the bottom to mass transfer all trophies to the cargo or inventory section of the trophy window and vice versa. Click "Collect all" or press [SPACE] to transfer the trophies from both sides of the trophy window to the corresponding windows.

traits.locale_text:
战利品窗口右侧的物品会放在您的物品栏中，这些物品可以由您的角色使用或装备。左侧的战利品则会被整理好，送到飞船的货舱中，之后可以用来与各大派系进行交易。
您可以按下鼠标左键，将战利品从窗口一侧拖拽至另一侧。除此之外，您还可以通过底部的按钮，将所有战利品移动至物品栏或货舱中，或是反向移动。点击“全部拿取”或按下空格键，可以将两侧的战利品移动至相应窗口。

languages.text:
戦利品ウィンドウの右側にある戦利品はインベントリに移動し、キャラクターが使用したり装備できる。左側の戦利品は貨物として船に積まれ、後にさ様々な陣営との取り引きに使うことができる。
戦利品は、[LMB]を使って戦利品をドラッグすることで、ウィンドウの片側から反対側へ移動させることができる。もしくは、下にあるボタンを使ってすべての戦利品を貨物セクションまたはインベントリセクションに一括転送することもできる。戦利品ウィンドウの両側から戦利品を対応するウィンドウに移動させるには、「すべてを回収」をクリックするか[SPACE]を押す。
languages.original_text:
Trophies on the right side of the trophy window go to your inventory — such items can be used or equipped by your characters. Trophies on the left are packed up as cargo and sent to your ship, which can later be used to trade with various factions.
You can move trophies from one side of the window to the other by dragging them over using [LMB]. Alternatively, you can use the buttons at the bottom to mass transfer all trophies to the cargo or inventory section of the trophy window and vice versa. Click "Collect all" or press [SPACE] to transfer the trophies from both sides of the trophy window to the corresponding windows.

戦利品は、[LMB]を使って戦利品をドラッグすることで、ウィンドウの片側から反対側へ移動させることができる。もしくは、下にあるボタンを使ってすべての戦利品を貨物セクションまたはインベントリセクションに一括転送することもできる。戦利品ウィンドウの両側から戦利品を対応するウィンドウに移動させるには、「すべてを回収」をクリックするか[SPACE]を押す。

languages.text:
Los trofeos a la derecha de la ventana de trofeos van a tu inventario. Tus personajes podrán usar o equipar estos objetos. Los trofeos de la izquierda se añaden al cargamento y se envían a tu nave. Más adelante te pueden servir para comerciar con distintas facciones.
Puedes mover los trofeos de un lado de la ventana al otro arrastrándolos con el [botón izquierdo del ratón]. Alternativamente, usa los botones de la parte inferior para trasladar en bloque todos los trofeos a la sección de cargamento o a la de inventario. Haz clic en «Recoger todo» o pulsa [ESPACIO] para transferir los trofeos de ambos lados de la ventana de trofeos a sus ventanas correspondientes.
languages.original_text:
Trophies on the right side of the trophy window go to your inventory — such items can be used or equipped by your characters. Trophies on the left are packed up as cargo and sent to your ship, which can later be used to trade with various factions.
You can move trophies from one side of the window to the other by dragging them over using [LMB]. Alternatively, you can use the buttons at the bottom to mass transfer all trophies to the cargo or inventory section of the trophy window and vice versa. Click "Collect all" or press [SPACE] to transfer the trophies from both sides of the trophy window to the corresponding windows.

languages.text: Trophäen auf der rechten Seite des Trophäenfensters wandern in dein Inventar und können von deinen Charakteren verwendet oder ausgerüstet werden. Trophäen auf der linken Seite werden als Fracht verstaut und deinem Schiff geschickt, damit du sie später mit verschiedenen Gruppierungen tauschen kannst. Du kannst Trophäen mit [LMB] auf die gewünschte Seite des Fensters ziehen. Alternativ dazu kannst du mit den Schaltflächen am unteren Bildschirmrand alle Trophäen in den Fracht- oder Inventarbereich des Trophäenfenster verschieben und umgekehrt. Klicke auf "Alle sammeln" oder drücke [SPACE], um Trophäen auf beiden Seiten des Trophäenfensters in die entsprechenden Fenster zu verschieben.
languages.original_text:
Trophies on the right side of the trophy window go to your inventory — such items can be used or equipped by your characters. Trophies on the left are packed up as cargo and sent to your ship, which can later be used to trade with various factions.
You can move trophies from one side of the window to the other by dragging them over using [LMB]. Alternatively, you can use the buttons at the bottom to mass transfer all trophies to the cargo or inventory section of the trophy window and vice versa. Click "Collect all" or press [SPACE] to transfer the trophies from both sides of the trophy window to the corresponding windows.

Trophäen auf der linken Seite werden als Fracht verstaut und deinem Schiff geschickt, damit du sie später mit verschiedenen Gruppierungen tauschen kannst.Du kannst Trophäen mit [LMB] auf die gewünschte Seite des Fensters ziehen. Alternativ dazu kannst du mit den Schaltflächen am unteren Bildschirmrand alle Trophäen in den Fracht- oder Inventarbereich des Trophäenfenster verschieben und umgekehrt. Klicke auf "Alle sammeln" oder drücke [SPACE], um Trophäen auf beiden Seiten des Trophäenfensters in die entsprechenden Fenster zu verschieben.

languages.text:
Les objets situés à droite de la fenêtre des trophées sont placés dans votre inventaire et peuvent être utilisés ou équipés par vos personnages. Ceux de gauche rejoignent la cargaison de votre vaisseau, en vue de leur utilisation ultérieure pour commercer avec différentes factions.
Vous pouvez déplacer les trophées d'un côté à l'autre de la fenêtre en les faisant glisser avec [BGS]. Vous pouvez également utiliser les boutons du bas pour transférer d'un coup tous les objets des cales du vaisseau à l'inventaire, et inversement. Cliquez sur « Tout récupérer » ou appuyez sur [ESPACE] pour transférer les trophées des deux côtés de la fenêtre vers les fenêtres correspondantes.
languages.original_text:

Alternatively, you can use the buttons at the bottom to mass transfer all trophies to the cargo or inventory section of the trophy window and vice versa. Click "Collect all" or press [SPACE] to transfer the trophies from both sides of the trophy window to the corresponding windows.

Vous pouvez déplacer les trophées d'un côté à l'autre de la fenêtre en les faisant glisser avec [BGS]. Vous pouvez également utiliser les boutons du bas pour transférer d'un coup tous les objets des cales du vaisseau à l'inventaire, et inversement. languages.text:
Ganimet penceresinin sağ tarafındaki ganimetler envanterine gider. Karakterlerin bu tarz eşyaları kullanabilir veya kuşanabilir. Sol taraftaki ganimetler ise paketlenir ve kargo olarak gemine gönderilir. Bunları daha sonra çeşitli fraksiyonlarla ticaret yapmak için kullanabilirsin.
Ganimetleri, sol fare tuşunu basılı tutup ganimeti sürükleyerek pencerenin bir tarafından diğerine taşıyabilirsin. Alternatif olarak, alttaki düğmeler aracılığıyla tüm ganimetleri ganimet penceresinin kargo veya envanter bölümüne ya da tam aksine toplu olarak aktarabilirsin. Ganimet penceresinin her iki tarafındaki ganimetleri ilgili pencerelere aktarmak için "Tümünü topla" düğmesine tıkla veya [BOŞLUK] tuşuna bas.
languages.original_text:
Trophies on the right side of the trophy window go to your inventory — such items can be used or equipped by your characters. Trophies on the left are packed up as cargo and sent to your ship, which can later be used to trade with various factions.
You can move trophies from one side of the window to the other by dragging them over using [LMB]. Alternatively, you can use the buttons at the bottom to mass transfer all trophies to the cargo or inventory section of the trophy window and vice versa. Click "Collect all" or press [SPACE] to transfer the trophies from both sides of the trophy window to the corresponding windows.
